TITLE: Episode 116 - Heroes and Villains w/ Dr. Reid Sheftall
DESCRIPTION: The Vixens this week were joined by Dr. Reid Sheftall, physicist turned plastic-then-cardiac surgeon and overall brilliant mind. We had a great conversation and are always happy to grow this group of allies in medical freedom, bodily autonomy, and truth seekers.
